reuters.title: H.B. SHAINE CEASES BROKER-DEALER OPERATIONS
reuters.body:
<H.B. Shaine and Co Inc> of Grand Rapids, Mich., ceas its broker-dealer operations, at the close of Oct 19, the New York Stock Exchange said. The firm reported that, under such financial difficulty, it could not continue to do business as a member firm of the NYSE, according to the NYSE. Officials of the company could not be reached for further comment.
Reuter 
